Params: {2: 'Liv', 3: 'When did the guards notice us... Browning, we have to leave with the device immediately!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Browning', 3: "No—n-no... It's covered with sand. We need to dig carefully...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Please do it quickly! Don't worry about the guards. I'll protect you.", 4: '1'}
